name: Quantum Physics Fundamentals
description: A deep dive into the core principles of quantum physics, including wave-particle duality and quantum entanglement.

name: Organic Chemistry Workshop
description: Hands-on experiments to understand organic compounds, reaction mechanisms, and functional groups.

name: Advanced Spanish Conversation
description: Boost your Spanish skills through immersive conversations and interactive activities.

name: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Get an overview of machine learning algorithms and their applications, with hands-on coding exercises.

name: Creative Writing for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of creative writing, including storytelling techniques, character development, and plot structuring.

name: Introduction to Astronomy
description: Explore the night sky, the stars, and our solar system with expert guidance and telescope observation.
